channel.title: Covid 19 on Making 50-50 Demand Forecasts
channel.description: Recent content in Covid 19 on Making 50-50 Demand Forecasts

item.title: Forecasting During a Pandemic - IBF Webinar
item.description: Introduction COVID-19 presents demand planning with plenty of challenges, though it also might present opportunities. An example given in the introduction was of Isaac Newton, who was a mere college student at Cambridge University when the campus closed in 1665 due to the Black Plague. While practicing the 1600â€™s version of social distancing, the curious and contemplative Newton formed his groundbreaking ideas on calculus, optics and gravity. These ideas were converted into theory when he returned to the reopened university in 1665.
